dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3957 IH: To repeal title VIII of the Higher Education Opportunity Act and title VIII of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Francis Rooney of Florida (for himself, Mr. Garrett, Mr. Lewis of Minnesota, Mr. Ferguson, Mr. Brat, Mrs. Handel, and Mr. Smucker) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To repeal title VIII of the Higher Education Opportunity Act and title VIII of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

subsection.text: Title VIII of the Higher Education Opportunity Act (Public Law 110â€“315) is repealed.
Title VIII of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1161a et seq.) is repealed.
